Sentencas: High-temperature alloys can be used to fabricate interconnects for reduced temperature solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: These alloys should be neither oxidized nor attacked by carbonaceous gases.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: Fourteen high-temperature alloys were tested in fuel gases.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: These alloys were exposed to a simulated SOFC environment.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: Alloys were attacked by metal dusting in carbonaceous gases of high carbon activity.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: Pits formed on the alloy surface and grew to large holes through the alloy plate, with subsequent disintegration into a powdery mixture composed of carbon, fine particles of metal, and carbide.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: The oxide scales on the alloy surface were found to prevent metal dusting corrosion.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: If the major phase in the oxide scale was chromic oxide, the alloys had good resistance to metal dusting corrosion.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: However, the alloys were easily attacked if the major phase was spinel.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: High chromium content in the alloy was helpful to resist metal dusting.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: The content of spinel in the oxide scales of Ni-base alloys was much less than that in Fe-base alloys.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: Therefore, the metal dusting rate of Ni-base alloys was lower than that of Fe-base alloys.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases

Sentencas: Alloys were more readily attacked by metal dusting in the high-pressure environment.
Titulo: Corrosion of metallic interconnects for SOFC in fuel gases
